name: symphony report pipeline
title: Symphony Report Generation Pipeline
description: Six-movement orchestration for generating comprehensive reports from symphony pipeline executions, metrics, and conformity audits.
purpose: Automate multi-format report generation (Markdown, JSON, HTML) with traceability lineage, recommendations, and audit summaries.
trigger: On-demand or post-execution via governance layer

movements.name: Data Collection & Aggregation
movements.description: Gather metrics from all pipeline executions, sequences, and audit systems

steps.title: Query Execution Metrics
steps.description: Fetch performance, latency, and resource metrics from execution logs

steps.title: Query Conformity Audit Data
steps.description: Retrieve conformity scores, violations, and audit results

steps.title: Query Sequence Traceability
steps.description: Collect sequence definitions, movements, beats, and handler mappings

steps.title: Aggregate Handler Coverage
steps.description: Analyze handler implementations, usage, and orphaned handlers

steps.title: Normalize All Metrics
steps.description: Standardize metric formats, calculate derived metrics, prepare for analysis

userStory.goal: the Data Collection & Aggregation process to execute with measurable, auditable results
userStory.benefit: reliable operations with measurable SLA compliance (target: 99

movements.businessValue: Enables reliable operations with measurable SLA compliance (target: 99.9%); supports performance tracking and continuous optimization

movements.name: Executive Summary Synthesis

steps.title: Calculate Summary Metrics
steps.description: Compute conformity score, violation counts, coverage percentages

steps.title: Compute Health Indicators
steps.description: Determine system health status (green/yellow/red) and trends

steps.title: Identify Critical Issues
steps.description: Extract CRITICAL violations and high-priority items for immediate action

steps.title: Generate Trend Analysis
steps.description: Compare current metrics to historical data, identify patterns

steps.title: Synthesize Summary Section
steps.description: Create formatted executive summary with visualizations and key findings

steps.description: Group violations into CRITICAL, MAJOR, MINOR buckets with context

steps.title: Analyze Root Causes
steps.description: Identify patterns and root causes for each violation class

steps.title: Generate Remediation Plans
steps.description: Create detailed fix strategies with effort estimates and dependencies

steps.title: Compute Priority Scores
steps.description: Calculate priority (severity + impact + effort) for sequencing fixes

steps.title: Synthesize Detailed Section
steps.description: Create detailed analysis markdown with tables, code examples, and guidance
